articles.title: This new museum in Quezon City offers glimpse of post-war Philippines
articles.description: Bahay Modernismo is a heritage museum nestled within the Quezon City Memorial Circle. Built using original architectural fragments from the former Aquino family home on Times Street, this modern bungalow-style house offers an immersive glimpse into the design, lifestyle, and cultural spirit of post-war Philippines.
articles.content:
Ever wondered what the Philippines looked like in the post-war era? No need to imagine — the newest museum in Quezon City brings the shining, shimmering 1950s to life.
Welcome to Bahay Modernismo, a heritage museum nestled within the Quezon City Memo... [1263 chars]

articles.title: UN Ocean Conference: significant increase in marine protected areas
articles.description: Marine protected areas will grow by around a third following government pledges at the UN Ocean Conference in Nice, France’s ecological transition minister said Wednesday.
articles.content:
Marine protected areas (MPAs) will increase by about a third following announcements made by governments at the UN Ocean Conference in Nice, the French ecological transition minister Agnès Pannier-Runacher said at a press conference on Wednesday.

articles.title: Death of great-grandmother could have been prevented following gall bladder surgery at Clare Hospital, inquest finds
articles.description: A great-grandmother who died after gall bladder surgery at a regional South Australian hospital could still be alive if a surgeon had abandoned the procedure earlier or had access to a CT scan, a coroner finds.
articles.content:
A great-grandmother who died after gall bladder surgery at a regional South Australian hospital could still be alive if a surgeon had abandoned the procedure earlier or had access to a CT scan, a coroner has found.

articles.title: Are teens taught enough life skills to know how to 'adult'?
articles.description: Some universities in Canada are offering Adulting 101 classes to teach students basic life skills like doing your taxes or changing a tyre. Should Australian schools be doing more?
articles.content:
Mai is a first-year medical student. She also doesn't know how to change a light bulb.
After her 18th birthday she moved out of her home in Shepparton, Victoria, to go to university in Armidale, New South Wales.

articles.title: DOH: Young adults account for most HIV cases in Caraga
articles.description: BUTUAN CITY – The Department of Health in the Caraga Region (DOH-13) bared that 1,967 HIV cases have been recorded in the area from 1995 to February of this year. “The DOH-13 continues its campaign to encourage individuals to undergo HIV testing,” said Arlene Serrano, the TB/HIV Program…
articles.content: HIV CASES. Arlene Serrano, DOH-13 TB/HIV Program Coordinator, reports in a press conference Wednesday (June 11, 2025) that Caraga has logged 1,967 HIV cases from 1995 to February 2025. The highest numbers are among age groups 25-34 (967 cases) and 15... [1628 chars]

articles.title: Residents of Ukraine's second-largest city terrorised in nine-minute drone strike
articles.description: A concentrated, nine-minute-long Russian drone attack has terrorised residents of Ukraine's second-largest city, killing at least six people and injuring more than 60.
articles.content:
The distinct lawnmower-like sound of Russia's attack drones woke residents across Ukraine's second-largest city at 12:30am.
Over the next nine minutes, there would be no pause.
The intense overnight assault killed at least six people and wounded 60 o... [4778 chars]
